blogPost.excerpt: Sharing in Clubhouse should be fast, easy, and convenient. That’s where we come in. Pick a hashtag. Share it in your room. Drop a link. Drop a question. Dropit.
blogPost.body: Sharing in Clubhouse should be fast, easy, and convenient. That’s where we come in. Pick a hashtag. Share it in your room. Drop a link. Drop a question. Dropit.
blogPost.title: Dropit for Clubhouse - Sharing in Clubhouse made easy
blogPost.author: Paul Shapiro

localize.description: 会所里的分享应该是快速、简单、方便的。这就是我们的优势所在。选择一个标签。在你的房间里分享它。放一个链接。提出一个问题。Dropit.
localize.tagline: 在会所里分享，让你轻松自在

localize.description: 會所裏的分享應該是快速、簡單、方便的。這就是我們的優勢所在。選擇一個標籤。在你的房間裏分享它。放一個鏈接。提出一個問題。Dropit.
localize.tagline: 在會所裏分享，讓你輕鬆自在

next.excerpt: Candid helps companies resume screen applicants to find the best and filter out the rest. Is your resume good enough to pass a resume screening? See if you pass the test by trying our demo on our website by uploading your resume to get automated insights.
next.title: Candid Resumes - Unbiased resume screening on autopilot

localize.description: Candid帮助企业简历筛选求职者，找到最优秀的人，过滤掉其他的人。你的简历够不够好，能不能通过简历筛选？通过上传您的简历，在我们的网站上尝试我们的演示，看看您是否通过了测试。
localize.tagline: 无偏见的简历筛选自动驾驶

localize.description: Candid幫助企業簡歷篩選求職者，找到最優秀的人，過濾掉其他的人。你的簡歷夠不夠好，能不能通過簡歷篩選？通過上傳您的簡歷，在我們的網站上嘗試我們的演示，看看您是否通過了測試。
localize.tagline: 無偏見的簡歷篩選自動駕駛
